question: The quorum to consitute a meeting of a House of the State Legislature shall be:
option1: One-third of total membership of House
option2: One-half of the total membership of the House
option3: One-tenth of the total membership of the House
option4: Ten members or one-tenth of total membership whichever is more
answer: Ten members or one-tenth of total membership whichever is more
explanation: Fourth option is the correct answer
